document.full_text: the color dyes used to brighten cereals, snacks and drinks help make some children hyperactive and should be banned or at least carry a warning, critics told u.s. government advisers on wednesday.
document.title: consumer group urges ban or warning on food dyes
lines_and_colors: the color dyes used to brighten cereals, snacks and drinks help make some children hyperactive and should be banned or at least carry a warning, critics told u.s. government advisers on wednesday.
